original: 曹操於長坂坡一役大敗劉備，驅兵大舉南下，意圖消滅孫權及劉備。但曹操軍隊由北方人組成，對水戰並不熟悉，也不識水性。
text: Cao Cao defeated Liu Bei at the battle of Changbanpo, and drove his troops south to destroy Sun Quan and Liu Bei. But Cao Cao's army was made up of northerners, and was not familiar with water warfare, nor did he know how to swim.
